alert.note: Alert for East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys; Eastern Santa Clara Hills; San Francisco Bay Shoreline (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 21 at 5:10PM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...Strong winds associated with the edge of a strong low pressure system will impact portions of Alameda, Contra Costa and northwestern Santa Clara Counties through 600 PM PDT... At 508 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a band of rain and strong winds over Danville, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oakland, Fremont, Hayward, Concord, Berkeley, Richmond, Antioch, San Leandro, Livermore, Alameda, San Ramon, Pleasanton, Union City, Walnut Creek, Pittsburg, Dublin, Newark, Danville, Martinez and Oakley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys; Eastern Santa Clara Hills; San Francisco Bay Shoreline
